item.title: Buried Press Council of India report on Paid News
item.description: It took a man like Sainath to break the story of paid news in public in the newspaper The Hindu. PCI (Press council of India) made a committee to look into the matter of paid news which came down heavily on ‘the big guys’. The report they submitted named the names which the ‘big guys’ did not like. They successfully buried its report - in the watered down version of this report, original report was reduced to a footnote.
